content.en: Boiler optimization: Researchers have been investigating ways to improve the efficiency and reduce emissions in coal-fired utility boilers. They have found that algorithms such as artificial neural networks, particle swarm optimization, support vector regression, and genetic algorithms can be used to optimize the combustion process and minimize NOx emissions. These data-driven approaches have shown promise in achieving better performance and reducing environmental impact in boiler systems.
content.da: Kedeloptimering: Forskere har undersøgt måder til at forbedre effektiviteten og reducere emissioner i kulfyrede forsyningskedler. De har fundet ud af, at algoritmer som kunstige neurale netværk, partikelsværmoptimering, support vector regression og genetiske algoritmer kan bruges til at optimere forbrændingsprocessen og minimere NOx-emissioner. Disse datadrevne tilgange har vist lovende resultater i at opnå bedre ydeevne og reducere miljøpåvirkningen i kedelsystemer.
